meanings.definition: The action of linking things together in a series.
meanings.sent1: The concatenations of colorful beads formed a beautiful necklace.
meanings.sent2: The concatenations of numbers in the math problem were confusing.
meanings.sent3: The concatenations of mismatched socks in the laundry basket made her laugh.
meanings.sent4: The concatenations of stars in the night sky seemed to form a celestial path.
meanings.sent5: The concatenations of puzzle pieces finally revealed the hidden picture.

meanings.definition: A series of interconnected things or events.
meanings.sent1: The concatenations of events led to an unexpected outcome.
meanings.sent2: The concatenations of stories in the book kept me engaged.
meanings.sent3: The concatenations of mishaps at the party made it unforgettable.
meanings.sent4: The concatenations of melodies in the song created a harmonious blend.
meanings.sent5: The concatenations of clues in the mystery novel kept me guessing.
